title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.14 - Permission for student landings, take-offs or taxiing required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.14 - Permission for student landings, take-offs or taxiing required

State Regulations

No aircraft shall land, take-off or taxi at the airport
with a student pilot at the controls without the permission of the airport
operator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1271.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
